 <br>
 <br>
For installing the dictionary in your iPhone.  <br>
 <br>

Open Wedict Pro 1.5 <br>

Go to setting <br>

http://sites.google.com/site/khmeriphone/IMG_0064.jpg
<br>

Click on Dictionaries <br>

http://sites.google.com/site/khmeriphone/IMG_0065.jpg
<br>
Click on Download <br>

http://sites.google.com/site/khmeriphone/IMG_0066.jpg
<br>
Click on "Download from URL"
<br>
http://sites.google.com/site/khmeriphone/IMG_0067.jpg
<br>

Enter the following URL :     http://khmeriphone.googlecode.com/files/ChuonNath%20Dico.zip
And Click Go
<br>
http://sites.google.com/site/khmeriphone/IMG_0068.jpg
http://sites.google.com/site/khmeriphone/IMG_0069.jpg
<br>
<br>
When download finished, then quick the Application and Re-Open it
<br>
 The Dictionary is there 
<br>
